src:
Performa Mohamed Salah Bersama Liverpool Disebut Menurun
06 Nov 2019, 21:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Liverpool Phil Thompson mengaku ia sedikit merasa khawatir dengan performa plus tingkat kebugaran Mohamed Salah belakangan ini.
Pemain asal Mesir itu tampak belum tampil dalam performa terbaiknya pada musim ini. Dan ia kemudian harus mengalami cedera engkel saat berlaga melawan Leicester City.
Meski dianggap tak tampil dalam performa terbaiknya, akan tetapi Salah masih bisa berkontribusi bagi Liverpool. Sejauh ini ia sudah mengemas lima gol di Premier League dan tiga gol di Liga Champions.
Salah sendiri diharap bisa tampil dalam performa terbaiknya bagi Liverpool akhir pekan ini. Sebab timnya akan menghadapi laga penting melawan Manchester City di Premier League.
text:
Mohamed's performance was wrong with Liverpool Called Declining
Nov 6 2019, 21:44 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool legend Phil Thompson admitted he was a bit worried about the performance plus the fitness level of Mohamed Salah recently.
The Egyptian player does not appear to appear in the best performance this season. And he then had to suffer an ankle injury when competing against Leicester City.
Although considered not performing in his best performance, but Salah can still contribute to Liverpool. So far he has packed five goals in the Premier League and three goals in the Champions League.
Salah himself is expected to perform in his best performance for Liverpool this weekend. Because his team will face an important match against Manchester City in the Premier League.
